title: Problems with Christmas event
body: Is what we only need one of our friends clicks on the link to get points

replies.body: I'm not sure what you're referring to.  I'm not aware of any points or link programs, so I'm concerned you and your friends are falling victim to phishing scams.  You should stop right away and use the[ account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to make sure your accounts are secure.  Be wary!
